text: Post-practice: Coach Bob Boughner says that Adin Hill will start tomorrow vs. WPG.
Adin Hill will start tomorrows season opener for the Sharks
A couple notes from Boughner: - Mario Ferraro named an alternate captain - Adin Hill starting in goal tomorrow
Adin Hill will start Sharks' opener on Saturday https://t.co/4fFKtMUrh6
Adin Hill will start San Jose's season opener on Saturday against Winnipeg. For Fantasy Analysis Click Here: https://t.co/XNcXKbtN3T
